channel.title: Refined Power bug: nuclear waste duplication
channel.description:
(maybe a bug?) running latest version on experimental
The nuclear heaters accept nuclear waste as an input, and return to you 10x what was put in. Just for giggles I put in 10 nuclear waste barrels, and immediately the machine spat out 100 barrels of waste, with no effect. Nudge for purex? ;)
just curious: is it normal that the heaters produce 10 barrels of waste (at full heat) per nuclear fuel rod consumed?

item.title: Refined Power bug: nuclear waste duplication
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:
